name: Hexillume
description:
Hexillume is a relaxing, minimalist puzzle game.


How to play

Move the hexagon's so their triangle's are pointing towards another triangle. When all the triangle's are lit up, the hexagon will light up. Light up all the hexagons to complete the level. Some hexagons cannot be moved, but can be rotated, flipped and more.

Levels start easy and gradually get more difficult.
Use hint's to help solve tricky levels!


Features

* 85 levels to beat
* A relaxing soundtrack
* Easy to play
* No time limit
* Earn a crown in every level by beating it in the perfect amount of moves
